sentence: Hayman provide beach chairs towels water umbrella stinger suites
Beautiful area great pools snorkeling the reef great food good accommodation standard not bad but not special
We managed to see two sea turtles on Langford Island
We enjoyed the Premium Ocean View Room but the Pool side rooms also looked good if being right by the pool is preferable
Nice walks around the Island and a great boat trip to Great Barrier Reef
This Island is unique beautiful cove beach well sheltered nice fauna and flora and its own island reef it is paradise
The flight was 25 minutes or so and was very scenic
Also one day we chartered a Seaplane for a areal sightseeing tour and snorkeling of the great barrier reef to take us to Whitehaven beach
We stayed here for a long weekend to celebrate our first anniversary in an Ocean View room
There are multiple restaurants two pools a beautifully clean beach a private marina and helicopter excursions with snorkeling or golf
It worked out to about 750 a person but was the highlight of the tripI also had a massage over the water in the bay
Yes the beach is tidal however that is the overall situation at all destinations in this part of Australia
We decided to move room to the Beach villa and change butler which was a good move and the room is cheaper
We stayed in a beach villa which there are only 8 of
A masseuse meets you at Coconut Beach where a massage table is set up IN THE SEA in order to facilitate an enchanting treatment accompanied by the sound of lapping waves
We booked in advance for 2 hours of wake boarding water sking but on the day the sea was too rough and these were cancelled
If we left the blinds up to enjoy the beach front views then everyone that walks past can see straight into our bedroom
Rocky bush tracks over the mountain to Blue Pearl Bay 1 was not on in the rain luging snorkeling gear
Final night dinner we booked an under the stars experience on the beach

For example the pool and beach towels were old and tattered the picnic baskets beach chairs and umbrellas were poor quality and looked cheap there were candles in lanterns all over the resort that in the 5 nights we stayed were never lit the interior of restaurants and rooms had dust dirt and cobwebs that were never cleaned glassware in some restaurants and on the yacht transfer were poor quality staff uniforms were tired and the fabrics not suited to the climate the marina is tired and needs renovating
An example they do not have a single person working the beach chairs etc to take ur order
The non motorized beach activities are free but are only available at high tide
pools had a lot of leaves and sand in them
